explains: adj. 独立的；不需依靠支撑物的

sentences.en: The earliest free-standing wooden church was probably built in Norway in around 1080.
sentences.cn: 最早的独立式木制教堂可能建于1080年左右的挪威。

sentences.en: The station chimney is 183m tall, the second highest free-standing structure in Scotland.
sentences.cn: 其电厂烟囱高达183米，也是苏格兰第二高的独立式结构烟囱。

sentences.en: All this has helped scientists and industry to solve the inherent problems of free-standing turbines.
sentences.cn: 所有的这些都帮助了科学家和生产厂家解决自立式涡轮机与生俱来的问题。
